survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Scooter Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding electric scooter sharing services in urban areas.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the options cover the full range of usage frequencies.
